rounds.category: THE KING JAMES BIBLE TELLS ME SO

clues.text:
James 5:
"Ye have heard of the patience of" this man

"Heal thyself"

Genesis 4:
"And the Lord set a mark upon" this man, "lest any finding him should kill him"

Matthew 14:
"Give me here" this man's "head in a charger"

John 20:
"Then saith he to" this man, "...be not faithless, but believing"
